e voice either higher or lower) that helps bring it out of the "muddy" stat=
ic level. As far as using the "noise eliminator" be careful here...a little=

e high or low filter actually does what we are wanting the noise filter to =

lity. Can always convert the wav to mp3 from withing audacity also. *you wi=
